-f|--filecount.#desc: Directory 'size' is number of child files/dirs not disk size

-s|--apparent-size.#desc: Use file length instead of blocks

-p|--full-paths.#desc: Subdirectories will not have their path shortened

-x|--limit-filesystem.#desc: Only count the files and directories on the same filesystem as the supplied directory

-b|--no-percent-bars.#desc: No percent bars or percentages will be displayed

-c|--no-colors.#desc: No colors will be printed (normally largest directories are colored)

-X|--ignore-directory.#desc: Exclude any file or directory with this name

-n|--number-of-lines.#desc: Number of lines of output to show. This is Height, (but h is help) [default: 20]

-w|--terminal_width.#desc: Specify width of output overriding the auto detection of terminal width
